name: Watch Out (itch) (Distorted Production)
description:
WATCH OUT 

Welcome to Watch Out 

• A thrilling and immersive game where players navigate through a haunted building

 • Players have to survive inside the building with the help of your suggestions. 

Game Objective 

• The player's objective is to survive from the abandoned building. 

• The player must avoid getting caught by the ghost and use the help of the person behind the computer to stay alive. 

• The player needs to be careful and strategic to move through the building.

Gameplay Mechanics 

• The person behind the computer has access to a set of cameras placed throughout the building, which provide a view of different areas. 

• The person behind the computer can monitor the cameras and provide advices to the player to letting him know the location of the ghost helping him to survive. 

• The person behind the computer can interact with a walkie talkie to tell the player the following sentences: I can hear something from: / I saw something in: - A) Room A - B) Hallway – C) Room C - D) Room D - E) Room E- F) Room F. The player will try to avoid the zone of the sentence

Ghost Mechanics 

• The ghost can be visible or invisible, and its location can sometimes only be detected through the cameras 

• The ghost makes sounds that can be heard through cameras, providing clues to its whereabouts 

• If the player gets too close to the ghost, he will get caught and lose the game
